identity.name: Nilam
identity.theme_strategy: Light Mode Default (Trust) with Dark Mode Toggle

headings.usage: Use for all section headers, hero titles, and price displays. The 'Clash' font adds a modern, slightly aggressive edge suitable for auctions.

body.usage: Use for descriptions, metadata, and UI elements. Clean, geometric, and highly legible.

mono.usage: Use strictly for countdown timers, transaction IDs, and bid history timestamps.

primary.name: Royal Blue
primary.usage: Primary actions (Bid Now), Trust indicators, Active states.

accent.name: Alert Red
accent.usage: Ending Soon (<1h), Outbid notifications, Error states.

layout.spacing_scale: Generous. Use p-6 or p-8 for cards. Gap-6 for grids.

grid_systems.bento: Use for Categories and Trending. Mix col-span-2 and col-span-1 cards.
grid_systems.dashboard: Dense grid. grid-cols-12. Sidebar col-span-2, Main col-span-10.

buttons.primary: bg-blue-600 hover:bg-blue-700 text-white rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-semibold shadow-lg hover:shadow-blue-500/30 transition-all
buttons.secondary: bg-white border border-slate-200 text-slate-900 hover:bg-slate-50 rounded-full px-6 py-2 font-medium

cards.auction_card: bg-white dark:bg-slate-900 border border-slate-200 dark:border-slate-800 rounded-xl overflow-hidden hover:shadow-xl transition-all duration-300 group
cards.glass_panel: bg-white/80 dark:bg-slate-900/80 backdrop-blur-md border border-white/20 shadow-sm

inputs.style: bg-slate-50 dark:bg-slate-800 border-transparent focus:border-blue-500 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500/20 rounded-lg h-12 px-4 transition-all

badges.live: bg-red-100 text-red-600 px-2 py-0.5 rounded text-xs font-bold uppercase tracking-wider animate-pulse
badges.new: bg-blue-100 text-blue-600 px-2 py-0.5 rounded text-xs font-bold uppercase

motion.hover_effects: Scale up 1.02 on cards. Buttons lift -2px.
motion.micro_interactions: Heart icon bursts on click. 'Bid Placed' success toast slides in from bottom-right.
motion.loading: Skeleton loaders with shimmering gradient (slate-100 to slate-200).

rules: Do not use generic centered layouts. Use asymmetry.
Use 2-3x more spacing than typical designs.
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
All interactive elements MUST include data-testid attribute.

instructions_to_main_agent: You are building Nilam, a high-trust auction marketplace. Focus on the 'Money Moments' - the bidding box, the countdown timer, and the winning notification. Use the provided assets and color codes strictly. Implement the 'Bento' grid for the homepage categories. Ensure the 'Bid Now' button is the most prominent element on any page it appears.
